channel.title: Whenever i restart my server
channel.description:
Ok guys i have been trying to fix this all night but couldn't find the right code to edit.. I know its in client.java but where?? i don't know what i should search and which code to search here is the problem:
Whenever my server restarts people lose their stuff when they log back in. Or they sometimes lose a lvl like, this is an example im lvl 85 mage and the server suddenly restarts and when i log back in im 84. or something. and then i lose some stuff.

item.title: Whenever i restart my server
item.dc:creator: @issac issac
item.description:
@issac wrote:

when people get d\c from mine they roll back like a min or 2. but i might have a temp fix for u…while ur offline. if u have a server panel u can have an auto talker talk and set the timer on it to the timer on ur auto restarter. make it yell server restarting. please logout. hope that helped a bit

Read full topic

item.title: Whenever i restart my server
item.dc:creator: @Greg_the_Xeno Greg the Xeno
item.description:
@Greg_the_Xeno wrote:

Start searching

Read full topic

item.title: Whenever i restart my server
item.dc:creator: @Kingen50cent Kingen50cent
item.description:
@Kingen50cent wrote:

What code should i search for in client java to do that.
“Disconnect”?
“ShutDown”?
“LogOut”
Cmon theres alot of things…

item.title: Whenever i restart my server
item.dc:creator: @Greg_the_Xeno Greg the Xeno
item.description:
@Greg_the_Xeno wrote:

Make it save on a timer or before the server is shutdown.

Read full topic

item.title: Whenever i restart my server
item.dc:creator: @Kingen50cent Kingen50cent
item.description:
@Kingen50cent wrote:

I ALREADY HAVE AN AUTO RESTARTER!
and thats what happens people lose their stuff when they log back in.
and i know that there is a solution to fix this…

Read full topic

item.title: Whenever i restart my server
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

Kingen50cent:

Ok is there a code i should edit in client.java so it only rolls back 0.1 sec not like 1 hour something.

you can’t, its just the way its done… i don’t think u can fix it unless you put a auto restarter on, so it might not dc so much and roll back when it does.

Read full topic

item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

Kingen50cent:

But what the hell, is there command which says “System update in 0.32” or something like in runescape theres got to be something i should edit so it only rolls you back 0.1 sec or something.

there is a command that does that, but you have to say it. it won’t automaticly say.
